name: Denaro Account
summary: Learn about .NMONEY files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Denaro is a personal finance manager that allows you to track your income and expenses. For example, you can use Denaro to create records for your checking account and savings account, and track deposits, debits, and transfers for both accounts.

Each account's transaction record is saved in a separate NMONEY file. When you transfer money between accounts in Denaro, the app logs the transaction in each account's NMONEY file. NMONEY files may be password-protected.

instructions: You can open an NMONEY file with Nickvision Denaro (Windows, Linux). From the app's Home screen, click Open. Then, navigate to and open your NMONEY file.

You can use Nickvision Denaro to export the data an NMONEY file contains in the .CSV or .PDF formats. To do so, select the button that appears next to the Search by description field. Then, select Export to File and choose your desired file type.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
